text: Olav Akselsen (28 August 1965 – 17 August 2021Akselsen, Olav (1965-2021), stortinget.no: "Født 28.08.1965 i Stord, Hordaland, Død 17.08.2021") was a Norwegian Labour politician. He was Minister of Petroleum and Energy from 2000 to 2001. He was a member of the Storting from 1989 until 2009. He was born in Stord, Norway. Akselsen died on 17 August 2021 in Oslo at the age of 55.Olav Akselsen er død ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Olav Akselsen
